product_name: Rubbermaid Blue Ice Block Hard Pack
long_description: The Rubbermaid Blue Ice Block Hard Pack is a nice ice substitute and can be frozen again and again for use in coolers. Sealed package means no mess when it melts. Compact size is just right for use in small coolers. Rigid sides are extra durable and puncture-resistant.
short_description: The Rubbermaid Blue Ice Block Hard Pack is a nice ice substitute and can be frozen again and again for use in coolers.
